ygData.subject: Re: Question - off topic
ygData.msgSnippet: I presume you mean a mantle, not a tunic? 60 pp for a tunic is a joke on Eci they go for 250, 200 is cheap, some ppl try to get 4/500 for them..... If they are
ygData.messageBody:
I presume you mean a mantle, not a tunic?

60 pp for a tunic is a joke on Eci they go for 250, 200 is cheap, some ppl
try to get 4/500 for them.....
If they are going for that little your economy is well and truly borked....
even more so than ours!



>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>>From: "Heffleys" <heffley@...>
>>
>>Hello
>>
>>Im on the Bertoxx server and Bloodstained Tunics are selling for 200pp and
>>up. I group 24-26s can get bloodstained tunics and shoulders.
>>
>>Zako Oyabun
>>25 Ranger
>>Master Fletcher
>>
>
>200 P? Really? What part of the world are you on? I see them all the time
at
>the Bazaar in Eastern Commons for 50P to 70P. I myself bought one for 60P.
>
